item.title: M2M - Don't Say You Love Me
item.description:
Got introduced
to you by a friend
You were cute
and all that
Baby you set the trend
yes you did oh
The next thing
I know we’re down
At the cinema
we’re sitting there
You start kissing me
what’s that about
You’re moving too fast
I don’t understand you
I’m not ready yet
baby I can’t pretend
No I can’t
the best I can do
Is tell you
to talk to me
It’s possible eventual
love will find a way
Don’t say you love me
You don’t even know me
If you really want me
Then give me some time
Don’t go there baby
not before I’m ready
Don’t say your heart’s
in a hurry
It’s not like we’re
gonna get married
Give me give me
some time-

item.title: M2M - Mirror Mirror
item.description:
Why don’t I like
the girl I see
The one who’s
standing right
In front of me
why don’t
I think
before I speak
I should have
listened to
That voice
inside me
I must be stupid
must be crazy

my mind
To say the kind of

you don’t

item.title: M2M - Everything
item.description:
It’s been nine days
eight hours
40 minues 10 second
since you called
I’ve been so crazy
I’m just about
Taking our picture off
the wall
It’s been
three months over
A hundred days since
you held my hand
And I miss you
in a thousand ways
Will I ever
see you again
How did change
so fast
I won’t give you
to the past
I really thought
it’d last
All that we had was
unbelievable
Now that it’s gone
it’s just
Inconceivable
still in my dream
You are
so damn beautiful
How could it be
that you ruined
my everything
everything everything
Everything everything
everything
It seems like
everywhere
Everyone’s in love
so where are you
And I remember you
couldn’t get enough
You felt it too
or didn’t you

so fast

to the past

item.title: M2M - Pretty Boy
item.description:
I lie awake
at night
See things
in black and white
I’ve only got you
inside my mind
You know you have
made me blind
I lie awake
and pray
That you will look
my way
I have all this
longing in my heart
I knew it right
from the star
Oh my pretty
pretty boy
I love you like
I never ever
Loved no one
before you
Pretty
pretty boy of mine
Just tell me
you love me too
Oh my pretty
pretty boy I need you
Oh my pretty
pretty boy I do
Let me inside make me
stay right beside you
I used to write
your name
And put it in a frame
and sometime I think
I hear you call right
from my bedroom wall
You stay
a little while
And touch me
with your smile
And what can I say
to make you mine
To reach out
for you in time

pretty boy
I love you like
I never ever

Tell me
